Amarillo.Caprock High School: Caprock High School is located in Amarillo, Texas in Potter, County which is part of the Texas Panhandle. Caprock is one of four high schools in the Amarillo Independent School District and classified as a 5A school by the UIL. Caprock was built in 1963 and celebrated its 50th graduating class in 2013. In 2015, the school was rated "Met Standard" by the Texas Education Agency.
